articles.title: You rely on us for your gas now, Qatar warns EU in bribery row - The Times
articles.description: Qatar has threatened to cut off energy supplies to Belgium and Europe in a row over a corruption scandal that has shaken the European Union.Eva Kaili, the disg
articles.content:
Qatar has threatened to cut off energy supplies to Belgium and Europe in a row over a corruption scandal that has shaken the European Union.
